nhtsa.description: NHTSA public API for vehicle recalls (no API key required)

cfpb.description: CFPB Consumer Complaints Database API (public, no key required)

cpsc.description: CPSC Product Recalls API (public, no key required)

newsapi.description: News API for company/product news (requires API key)

courtlistener.description: Legal cases, opinions, and dockets from CourtListener (requires API key, 5k req/hour)

trustpilot.description: Business reviews and ratings (requires API key)

opencorporates.description: Company records and legal filings from OpenCorporates (optional API key, 50 req/day free tier)

openfda.description: FDA adverse events and recalls for drugs and devices (optional API key, 240 req/min, 1k req/day without key, 120k req/day with key)

datagov.description: Government datasets, recalls, and advisories from data.gov catalog (optional API key, 30 req/hour without key, 1k req/hour with key)

secedgar.description: SEC EDGAR company filings mentioning product liability, recalls, class actions (no API key, requires User-Agent, 10 req/sec limit)

gdelt.description: GDELT Global Database of Events, Language, and Tone - news articles with sentiment analysis (no API key, 30 req/min, max 250 records per query)

ftc.description: FTC enforcement actions, consumer alerts, and business guidance from press release RSS feeds (optional API key, 30 req/min)
